import numpy as np


[docs]def distance_point2line(p, p0, v):
    s = np.sum(v*(p-p0))
    closest = p0 + (s*v)   # This might be .dot()
    d = np.sqrt(np.sum((p-closest)*(p-closest)))

    return s, closest, d





[docs]def distance_line2line(p01, v1, p02, v2):

    v1v2 = np.sum(v1*(v2))
    p01v1 = np.sum(p01*(v1))
    p02v1 = np.sum(p02*(v1))
    p01v2 = np.sum(p01*(v2))
    p02v2 = np.sum(p02*(v2))

    s1 = (p02v1 - p01v1 + p01v2*v1v2 - p02v2*v1v2)/(1 - v1v2*v1v2)
    s2 = p01v2 + s1*v1v2 - p02v2

    p1 = p01 + s1*v1
    p2 = p02 + s2*v2
    d = np.sqrt(np.sum((p1-p2)*((p1-p2))))

    return(s1, s2, p1, p2, d)
